title: Show Me the Magic: The Adventures of Don McAlpine [Q&A]

abstract: ACMI question and answer session (chaired by Rochelle Siemienowicz) with acclaimed Australian cinematographer Don McAlpine and filmmaker Cathy Henkel, producer/director of the 2012 documentary on McAlpine 'Show Me the Magic'.
description: Cathy Henkel's 2012 documentary 'Show Me the Magic' about Australian cinematographer Don McAlpine brought together personal and professional connections, including Gillian Armstrong, Bruce Beresford and Baz Lurhmann, to explore his life and career.  This question and answer session with Cathy Henkel and Don McAlpine, chaired by Rochelle Siemienowicz, was held at ACMI in September 2013 following a screening of the documentary.
